speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, it will now be my privilege to present the General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers of the Church for your sustaining vote.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Please express your support in the usual way. If there are those who oppose any of the proposals, we ask that you contact your stake president.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints; Dallin Harris Oaks as First Counselor in the First Presidency; and Henry Bennion Eyring as Second Counselor in the First Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any, may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Dallin H. Oaks as President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles and Jeffrey R. Holland as Acting President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please signify.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles: Jeffrey R. Holland, Dieter F. Uchtdorf, David A. Bednar, Quentin L. Cook, D. Todd Christofferson, Neil L. Andersen, Ronald A. Rasband, Gary E. Stevenson, Dale G. Renlund, Gerrit W. Gong, Ulisses Soares, and Patrick Kearon.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the counselors in the First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as prophets, seers, and revelators.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Contrary, if there be any, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following General Authorities will be released from their assignments and given emeritus status, effective on August 1, 2024: Elders Ian S. Ardern, Shayne M. Bowen, Paul V. Johnson, S. Gifford Nielsen, Brent H. Nielson, Adrián Ochoa, Gary B. Sabin, and Evan A. Schmutz.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to express gratitude to these brethren and their wives for their years of dedicated service throughout the Church may do so by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We also release Elder Carlos A. Godoy from serving as a member of the Presidency of the Seventy, effective on August 1, 2024.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to express appreciation to Elder Godoy for his service in this capacity may do so.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We note with gratitude the Area Seventies who will complete their service and whose names can be found on the Church’s website.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join in expressing appreciation to these brethren and to their families for their years of selfless service may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We extend releases to the Sunday School General Presidency, effective on August 1, 2024, as follows: Mark L. Pace as President, Milton Camargo as First Counselor, and Jan E. Newman as Second Counselor.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All who wish to join in expressing appreciation to these brothers for their devoted service may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as members of the Presidency of the Seventy: Elder Marcus B. Nash, who began his service in January 2024, and Elders Michael T. Ringwood, Arnulfo Valenzuela, and Edward Dube, who will begin their service on August 1, 2024.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as General Authority Seventies: David L. Buckner, Gregorio E. Casillas, Aroldo B. Cavalcante, I. Raymond Egbo, D. Martin Goury, Karl D. Hirst, Christopher H. Kim, Sandino Roman, Steven D. Shumway, Michael B. Strong, and Sergio R. Vargas.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We note that 64 new Area Seventies were sustained during the general conference leadership meetings on Thursday, April 4, and then announced on the Church’s website. We invite you to sustain these brethren in their new assignments.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as the new Sunday School General Presidency, to be effective on August 1, 2024: Paul V. Johnson as President, Chad H Webb as First Counselor, and Gabriel W. Reid as Second Counselor.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so signify.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We note that Brother Reid is currently serving as president of the Australia Sydney Mission and is therefore not in Salt Lake City for the conference.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the other General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers as presently constituted.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor may do so by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Thank you, brothers and sisters, for your continued faith and prayers on behalf of the leadership of the Church.

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following Area Seventies were sustained during a leadership session held as part of general conference:

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: The following Area Seventies will be released on or before August 1, 2024:

speaker: Presented by President Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Solomon I. Aliche, Guillermo A. Alvarez, Daren R. Barney, Julius F. Barrientos, James H. Bekker, David L. Buckner, Glenn Burgess, Marcos Cabral, Gregorio E. Casillas, Dunstan G. B. T.
